content.text: Add a new legendary item if no equipment can be made legendary
content.help: When a legendary enemy does not have any equipment that can be made legendary, generate a legendary item like the base game would

content.text: Chance of the enemy's weapon being made legendary
content.help: The percent chance that the enemy's weapon is chosen as the legendary item instead of a piece of their armor

content.text: Chance of adding a new legendary weapon
content.help: The percent chance that if the enemy's weapon is going to be made legendary, it will be a new weapon from the legendary leveled lists

content.text: Chance of adding a new legendary armor piece
content.help: The percent chance that if the enemy's armor is going to be made legendary, it will be new armor from the legendary leveled lists

content.text: These settings may drastically alter the game's balance or could result in enemies visually unequipping and equipping their armor shortly after you see them. They can be fun, but use at your own discretion.
Chance of normal enemies getting legendary items
content.help: The percent chance that normal enemies will get legendary items. Useful if you are using mods that give normal and legendary enemies different equipment.
